plot: During a trip to film a legal battle of sick miners in a remote small town of China, the young documentary crew believed they got everything discovered and 'covered', until the Big Brother came to knock on their door.
title: A Very Short Filming Trip
plot_es: During a trip to film a legal battle of sick miners in a remote small town of China, the young documentary crew believed they got everything discovered and 'covered', until the Big Brother came to knock on their door.
plot_en: During a trip to film a legal battle of sick miners in a remote small town of China, the young documentary crew believed they got everything discovered and 'covered', until the Big Brother came to knock on their door.
